ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectCertificate of Public Convenience and Necessity OC-43
PrecisOrder to issue Amending Order AO-006-OC-43 to vary the CERTIFICATE OF PUBLIC CONVENIENCE AND NECESSITY OC-43 to reflect the change in name of the owner and operator of the Taylor to Boundary Lake Pipeline.
